<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hexing Jar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2324)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 148 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Dangling from a simple cord, a _hexing jar_ houses rich soil. When a [witch](/Classes.aspx?ID=16) who has invested the jar wears it overnight, a miniature thing grows from the soil. Your patron chooses the form, commonly including glowing mushrooms, venus flytraps, mandragora roots, or undead hands reaching up. The thing whispers secrets it learned from your patron, giving you a +2 item bonus to your patron skill.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a witch [hex](/Traits.aspx?ID=324) spell. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You roll a critical success on an attack roll with a witch spell, or your target rolls a critical failure on its saving throw against a witch spell or hex you cast;  **Effect** The thing in the jar becomes more energetic—glowing, dancing, rapping on the glass, or some other action appropriate to its appearance. It encourages you until the start of your next turn, granting you and your familiar a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws and a +2 status bonus against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects.

**Craft Requirements** You are a witch.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
